content: I'm trying to organize my vinyl collection and I was wondering if you could recommend some good record storage options. I just got a few new albums, including a rare pressing of The Cure's "Disintegration" and a reissue of Joy Division's "Unknown Pleasures", and I want to make sure they're stored properly. By the way, I also traded one of the CDs I found at a garage sale with a friend for an item I've been wanting for ages.
